refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The AgsPlayable interface gives you a unique access to file related IO operations.

refsect2.title: ags_playable_open ()
refsect2.para: Opens a file in read-only mode.

refsect2.title: ags_playable_rw_open ()
refsect2.para: Opens a file in read/write mode.

refsect2.title: ags_playable_level_select ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_playable_level_select (AgsPlayable *playable, guint nth_level, gchar *sublevel_name, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Select a level in an monolythic file where nth_level and sublevel_name are equivalent. If sublevel_name is NULL nth_level will be chosen.

refsect2.title: ags_playable_info ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_playable_info (AgsPlayable *playable, guint *channels, guint *frames, guint *loop_start, guint *loop_end, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Retrieve information about selected audio data.

refsect2.title: ags_playable_set_presets ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_playable_set_presets (AgsPlayable *playable, guint samplerate, guint buffer_size, guint channels, guint format);
refsect2.para: Retrieve information about selected audio data.

refsect2.title: ags_playable_get_presets ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_playable_get_presets (AgsPlayable *playable, guint *samplerate, guint *buffer_size, guint *channels, guint *format);
refsect2.para: Retrieve information about selected audio data.

refsect2.title: ags_playable_set_loop ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_playable_set_loop (AgsPlayable *playable, guint loop_start, guint loop_end);

refsect2.title: ags_playable_read ()
refsect2.programlisting: signed short * ags_playable_read (AgsPlayable *playable, guint channel, GError **error);
refsect2.para: Read audio buffer of playable audio data.

refsect2.title: ags_playable_write ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_playable_write (AgsPlayable *playable, signed short *buffer, guint buffer_length);
refsect2.para: Write buffer_length of buffer audio data.

refsect2.title: ags_playable_seek ()
refsect2.programlisting: void ags_playable_seek (AgsPlayable *playable, guint frames, gint whence);

refsect2.title: ags_playable_read_audio_signal ()
refsect2.programlisting: GList * ags_playable_read_audio_signal (AgsPlayable *playable, AgsSoundcard *soundcard, guint start_channel, guint channels);
refsect2.para: Read the audio signal of AgsPlayable .
